thread.title: Burnley vs Sunderland: Joey Barton pictured arriving at Turf Moor… so maybe the move is back on
thread.title_full: Burnley vs Sunderland: Joey Barton pictured arriving at Turf Moor… so maybe the move is back on

author: jhutchinson
title: Burnley vs Sunderland: Joey Barton pictured arriving at Turf Moor… so maybe the move is back on
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JOEY BARTON was pictured arriving at Turf Moor today in the clearest indication that Burnley remain keen to sign him. 
A potential January deal was put into doubt when it was confirmed Barton could face a ten-match ban for placing 1,260 bets over a ten-year period. PA:Press Association 4 Joey Barton signs some autographs for fans as he arrives at Turf Moor ahead of Burnley vs Sunderland 
But he was seen arriving with the rest of the squad today ahead of the home clash against Sunderland. 
Keep up to date with ALL the BURNLEY news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The England one-cap wonder, 34, had agreed a deal in principle to move to Turf Moor next month. Getty Images Barton looked somewhat flustered as he made his way to the players’ entrance at Turf Moor Reuters It seems Burnley are still keen on signing the former Rangers and Newcastle man despite his betting misdemeanour Related Stories Karren Brady Liverpool show they will run Chelsea close, Leicester deserve Team of the Year and Hammers are the new Gunners Burn Barton's deal Burnley ready to turn their backs on Joey Barton deal as midfielder faces a ten-match ban for betting taking a gamble Joey Barton charged by the FA for placing a staggering 1,260 bets over a ten-year span bartON'S BACK Joey Barton re-signs for Burnley on short-term deal until the end of the season following Rangers disaster I'M AVERAGE JOE Joey Barton claims Scottish media built him up to be Lionel Messi or Neymar of Rangers BUR-NING DESIRE? Burnley boss Sean Dyche refuses to rule out Turf Moor return for Joey Barton who is training with club BACK FOR MOOR Joey Barton back with Burnley ahead of sensational return to Prem following Rangers row 
And thankfully for him, it appears he is still in the fold with Clarets boss Sean Dyche . 
When news broke of the betting incident a Burnley club statement read: “Burnley FC have been made aware of FA charges brought against Joey Barton relating to historic betting on football matches. 
“The club will be discussing the matter with Joey and his legal representatives.” 
Barton helped Sean Dyche’s men win promotion and was named player of the year last season. 
But any hopes of rejoining the club following an ill-fated spell at Rangers looked like they were put in jeopardy – until his arrival this afternoon. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport’s daily LIVE blog Getty Images Barton had agreed a deal in principle to rejoin Burnley in January – but that was thrown into some doubt Burnley 4 Sunderland 1: Andre Gray’s first Premier League hat-trick sinks Black Cats
